import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Profile() { const user = { name: 'Evan Huggins', bio: 'Travel | Foodie | Photographer', profilePicture: 'https://source.unsplash.com/80x80?face', followers: 2500, following: 300 }; return (

{user.name}

{user.bio}

{user.followers} followers {user.following} following
) }
